'''Polished andesite stairs''' are a [[polished andesite]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Polished andesite stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Polished Andesite Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}
